topic.title: Seeding Question
topic.body: Does ZeroNet get faster the more disk space I allocate to seed? It's 10MB by default I think, so if I set it to, say, 5GB that should help all the sites I visit, right? Or is that a waste of space on my part?

1565125379_1ATpyKRza3N49rrjJFPznrUG9BN1i.body:
> [duck0](#comment_79_17bfQv5PQW9FZ4akChr7ECfqP2SKuAXwM5): Speed depends on your disk and internet speed.  [...]

thx man

1582442446_1JmxhPt4FDP7rTmmaxoKdwTSDhwg5.body:
> [linuxsourced](#comment_5_1JmxhPt4FDP7rTmmaxoKdwTSDhwg5YSatG): Can you at least answer my question if there is  a way to stop zeronet from downloading sites to be used offline.

No, the whole point of zeronet is saving sites offline. If you want you can delete your zite data after every session.

1589423797_14g2gXnsZdEPShFJkGdh5W3eGXmKz.body: The Lighthouse was pretty good IMO. For books Kaiserchronik is good if you have a translation.

> [merithtk](#comment_16_14g2gXnsZdEPShFJkGdh5W3eGXmKzqW6F8): that genre is The Lighthouse? Currently binge watching stargate so that kinda hints at the catagories i like.(on season 10, on the quest for the Holy Grail to defeat a new big bad)

Lighthouse is thriller. If you like the Stargate show, maybe watch the movie? Or some Star Trek, or read the Hitchhiker's series.
